forum.content:
My friend wanted to attend a dance class called "Zumba Fitness" and she looked for a partner.
I'd like to try something new and learn how to dance so I planned to join the dance class as well.
Before I go, I googled what Zumba is and then I watched youtube and danced....... after that I felt so satisfied and hungry...... LOL
Go check this vedio out if you'd like to know what zumba is. ^^
forum.title: 【Sharing】Zumba Fitness
